origin.reincarnation-origins.werewolf-hu: You are a transformative creature, shifting into different shapes and summoning your loyal pack to assist you.
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/hum: Killing enemies fuels your transformations. Half a bar of §4Blood§a to transform into Lithe Form, and a full bar to shift into Brute Form
Call to your pack, summoning them to your location. [SHIFT + Summon] to unsummon them.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.werew: Call the pack to your side!
Have one of your wolves apply Regeneration to the pack.
Have one of your wolves apply Resistance to the pack.
Have one of your wolves apply Strength to the pack.
Have one of your wolves apply Speed to the pack.
Gain enough §4Blood§a to be able to take on your Lithe Form.
Create enough carnage to be able to take on your Brute Form.
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/all: You are unable to eat food or regenerate health. Gain sustenance and health by feasting on enemies killed by your claws.
Your heightened senses show you the location of nearby enemies.
Your unusual shape and size allows you to only wear leather armor.
Your strength waxes and wanes with the phases of the moon. You are most powerful during a full moon, and least powerful during a new moon.
You regain health by feasting on enemies!
reincarnation-origins.advancements.werew: Inflict an enemy with Severe Bleeding using your claws.
Feast on the remains of your foes. (By killing them with your bare claws.)
Wear a full set of leather armor in one of your werewolf forms.
Be alive during a full moon and feel the power.
Be alive during a new moon and feel the power leave you.
origin.reincarnation-origins.werewolf-br: The King of the night, let nothing stand in your way.
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/bru: You are more powerful in this form, you naturally have increased strength and hardiness. You're also larger.
You do more damage and cause bleeding with your claws.
Killing enemies fuels your §4Rage§a, keeping you in brute form for longer.
Channel your §4Rage§a into strength and resistance!
Your most powerful pack mate joins you in the fight!
reincarnation-origins.advancements.werew: Take on your Brute form by channeling your full bloodlust!
Trade some of your remaining time in Brute form to go berserk.
Make an enemy bleed with your powerful claws.
Kill an enemy to add fuel to your transformation.
Your most powerful pack-mate joins you!
Have your pack-mate grant you both Strength and Haste.
Fill your §4Rage§a bar. You'll now gain more §4Rage§a on kill while in Brute Form.
Stay in Brute Form for two consecutive minutes! You'll now gain more §4Rage§a on kill while in Brute Form.
Stay in Brute Form for five consecutive minutes!
Stay in Brute Form for ten consecutive minutes!
Stay in Brute Form for fifteen consecutive minutes!
Really, you can stop, your sanity is important. Thirty Minutes is a long time.
That's it! You've mastered afk-ing at your mob grinder! Good job! Feel free to take a vacation now, maybe try out the Phoenix.
origin.reincarnation-origins.werewolf-li: The Ultimate Lone Wolf, stalk your prey from the shadows!
power.reincarnation-origins.werewolf/lit: You are faster, smaller, and hardier.
You cause bleeding when hitting an enemy with your claws. If you are invisible cause severe bleeding.
You are much stronger while invisible.
Cloak yourself for a short time. Lose invisibility when attacking.
Activate to pounce on your enemies. Sneak + Activate to become invisible.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.werew: Take on your Lithe form by channeling a portion of your bloodlust!
Turn invisible by crouching in the shadows for 5 seconds.
Reset the cooldown of your leap/stealth by killing an enemy with your claws.
Leap at an enemy, turning invisible and preparing to inflict Severe Bleeding
Cloak yourself and gain immense power.
Inflict Bleeding on an enemy with your claws.
Inflict an enemy with Severe Bleeding with your claws.
